title.narrative: Reducing Mercury Emissions from the Coal Combustion Sector

description.narrative: Within this project The IEA Clean Coal Centre (IEA CCC) will run a 1 day meeting/workshop, in conjunction with the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) Coal Partnership, in India to raise awareness on issues related to emissions from the coal combustion sector.

person-name.narrative: Jenee Sharon; Wes Aviles; Ryan Boles

title.narrative: Conference and Workshop administration on counterfeit medication and pandemic issues

description.narrative: To support a capacity building program to increase counterfeit and substandard medication prevention for South and Central Asia government regulators, to provide logistical travel arrangements to the developing country officials participating in a Pandemic Influenza Preparedness (PIP) workshop aimed at building greater stakeholder engagement on PIP Framework implementation and provide logistical support for an AMR (Ani-Microbial Resistance) workshop.

person-name.narrative: Jenee Sharon; Wes Aviles; Ryan Boles

sector.narrative: Pandemic Influenza and Other Emerging Threats (PIOET)

description.narrative: To strengthen capacity to assess and manage data and capacity-limited fisheries in Mexico, Peru and Chile

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date

title.narrative: Reducing Mercury Use and Release in Andean Artisanal Gold Mining Countries

description.narrative: The original goal of this small project was to provide demonstration to miners in the Piura region, North of Peru, on how they can reduce or even eliminate mercury use in their gold mining operations. The project extended to involve miners from other Andean regions (Peru, Ecuador, Bolivia and Colombia. project is closed

person-name.narrative: Jenee Sharon; Wes Aviles; Ryan Boles

title.narrative: Support for Lacey Act Amendment Outreach and Related Capacity training Activities in Brazil and Honduras

description.narrative: To convene a symposium of relevant Brazilian and US experts examining scientific valid methods of wood idenfitication and sources; to conduct workshop for government officials on investigating and prosecution of illegal logging cases.

person-name.narrative: Jenee Sharon; Wes Aviles; Ryan Boles

title.narrative: Reducing the Use and Release of Mercury by Artisanal Gold Miners in Latin America

description.narrative: Develop and implement a technical governance model to reduce mercury use.
